crawlability.llms_txt_content:
# Lead Gear Digital Marketing

> Lead Gear is a results-driven B2B digital marketing and web design agency based in Dallas-Fort Worth, Texas. For over 20 years, we've been partnering with manufacturers, service providers, and distributors to develop high-performing websites and digital marketing strategies that generate qualified leads and accelerate business growth.

## Company Overview

Lead Gear specializes in serving B2B and industrial companies, with particular expertise in manufacturing, distribution, and service sectors. Our in-house, US-based team delivers comprehensive digital solutions that move the needle for our clients.

**Key Differentiators:**
- Over 20 years of experience in B2B digital marketing
- Specialized focus on industrial, manufacturing, and distribution companies
- In-house development team (no outsourcing)
- Long-term partnership approach (most clients engage in ongoing services)
- Dual locations: Richardson, TX and Plano, ////tx

**Certifications & Partnerships:**
- Semrush Certified Agency Partner
- Google Partner
- HubSpot Partner
- SharpSpring Marketing Automation Certified
- Recognized by Clutch as Top 2024 SEO Company in Dallas

## Core Services

### Digital Marketing Services

We drive qualified leads through strategic digital marketing that delivers measurable ROI.

- [SEO Services](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Search engine optimization strategies tailored to B2B and industrial companies
- [Local SEO](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Dominate local search results for service area businesses
- [Digital Advertising](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Targeted paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, social media)
- [Content Marketing](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Strategic content creation that attracts and converts qualified leads
- [Email Marketing](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Nurture campaigns that move prospects through the sales funnel
- [Marketing Automation](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Automated workflows and lead nurturing systems

### Website Design & Development Services

We build high-performing websites optimized for lead generation, user experience, and search engines.

- [Website Design](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): Custom, responsive designs that build credibility and drive conversions
- [Catalogs & eCommerce](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): Online catalogs and eCommerce solutions for product showcasing and sales
- [Custom Development](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): Tailored solutions including distributor locators, custom integrations, and advanced functionality
- [UX/UI Optimization](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): User experience improvements that increase engagement and conversions
- [Website Hosting & Security](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): Reliable, secure hosting with ongoing maintenance
- [Support & Maintenance](https://www.leadgear.com/web-design/): Continuous support and updates to keep websites performing optimally

## Industries We Serve

Lead Gear has deep expertise serving B2B and industrial sectors:

**Manufacturing:** Industrial equipment, machinery, chemicals, fabrication, and specialty manufacturing
**Distribution:** Wholesale distributors, industrial suppliers, and parts distribution
**Energy & Oilfield:** Oilfield services, energy equipment, lubricants, and related services
**Service Providers:** Commercial services, industrial services, and professional services
**Material Handling:** Warehouse automation, forklifts, conveyors, and logistics solutions
**Construction & Building:** Building materials, construction equipment, and related services

## Portfolio & Case Studies

View our complete portfolio of B2B website designs and digital marketing campaigns:

- [Full Portfolio](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Browse our complete collection of client projects
- [Jet-Lube](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio-items/jet-lube/): Leading manufacturer of lubricants for oilfield and industrial markets - comprehensive website with distributor locator
- [Pencco](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio-items/pencco/): Water and wastewater treatment chemicals manufacturer - extensive product catalog and SDS library
- [Steelman Industries](https://www.steelman.com): Automotive tool manufacturer with enhanced online presence
- [Texas Hydraulics](https://www.texashydraulics.com): Hydraulic systems company with first-class web development
- [Triple/S Dynamics](https://www.sssdynamics.com): Industrial equipment manufacturer with comprehensive site redesign
- [Advanced Intralogistics](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Full systems integrator of warehouse automation and distribution solutions
- [Impact Forklift Solutions](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Premier Linde forklift provider for multi-state region
- [KWS Manufacturing](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Leading manufacturer of screw conveyors and bulk material handling systems
- [Oilgear](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Manufacturer of pumps, valves, and engineering systems
- [Whitmore Manufacturing](https://www.leadgear.com/portfolio/): Global leader in industrial asset performance products

## Knowledge Base & Resources

### SEO & Search Engine Optimization

- [The Importance of Content in SEO](https://www.leadgear.com/the-importance-of-content-in-search-engine-optimization-seo/): How search-optimized content drives rankings and conversions
- [Long-Tail Keywords Explained](https://www.leadgear.com/simplified-seo-strategies-long-tail-keywords-explained/): Understanding and implementing long-tail keyword strategies for better targeting
- [Clutch Recognition](https://www.leadgear.com/lead-gear-recognized-by-clutch-as-top-2022-seo-company-in-dallas/): Lead Gear recognized as Top 2024 SEO Company in Dallas

### Content Marketing

- [Why Great Content is Crucial](https://www.leadgear.com/how-to-create-meaningful-content-that-represents-value/): The role of meaningful content in digital marketing strategy
- [Content Marketing Services](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Strategic content creation for lead generation

### General Digital Marketing

- [Blog & Articles](https://www.leadgear.com/blog/): News, insights, and best practices for B2B digital marketing
- [Digital Marketing Overview](https://www.leadgear.com/digital-marketing/): Comprehensive guide to our digital marketing approach and services

## Company Information

- [About Lead Gear](https://www.leadgear.com/our-company/): Our story, team, mission, and values
- [Contact Us](https://www.leadgear.com/contact/): Get in touch for a free website health assessment
- [Careers](https://www.leadgear.com/careers/): Join our team of digital marketing professionals
- [Privacy Policy](https://www.leadgear.com/privacy-policy/): Our commitment to data privacy and security

## Contact Information

**Phone:** 469.726.4321  
**Email:** shift@leadgear.com  
**Locations:**
- Richardson, TX (Dallas area)
- Fort Worth, TX

## Key Value Propositions

1. **Results-Driven Approach:** We focus on generating qualified leads and measurable ROI, not just traffic or vanity metrics
2. **B2B Specialization:** Deep expertise in manufacturing, distribution, and industrial sectors means we understand your unique challenges
3. **Long-Term Partnerships:** Our clients stay with us because we deliver ongoing value - virtually every portfolio client continues with ongoing services
4. **In-House Team:** All work is performed by our US-based team, ensuring quality, communication, and accountability
5. **Full-Service Capabilities:** From strategy to execution, we handle all aspects of your digital presence
6. **Conversion-Focused:** Every website and marketing campaign is optimized to turn visitors into qualified leads

## Technologies & Platforms

- WordPress and Craft CMS for website development
- HubSpot for marketing automation and CRM
- SharpSpring for marketing automation
- Semrush for SEO and competitive analysis
- Google Ads and Analytics for paid advertising and tracking
- Custom integrations including distributor locators, product catalogs, and specialized functionality

details.description_text: Dallas-based internet marketing company, Lead Gear, delivers professional web design, search engine optimization, local search and social media marketing services.
